commit.message:
i386.md (extv, [...]): Revalidate the operand with ext_register_operand.

        * config/i386/i386.md (extv, extzv, insv): Revalidate the
        operand with ext_register_operand.

From-SVN: r92287

files.patch:

+	* config/i386/i386.md (extv, extzv, insv): Revalidate the
+	operand with ext_register_operand.
